summary: Crazy Sexy Cancer is an irreverent and uplifting documentary about a young woman looking for a cure and finding her life. Weeks after she was diagnosed, filmmaker Kris Carr began ... See full summary »
cast: Aura Carr|Kenneth Carr|Kris Carr|Leslie Carr|Anna Maria Clement|Brian Clement|Bhagavan Das|George Demetri|Jackie Farry|Brian Fassett|Melissa Gonzalez|Oni Faida Lampley|Kezia Snyder|Yogeswari|Erin Zammett
title: Crazy Sexy Cancer
